Uses of Class
org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.db.jdbc.JdbcDatabaseManager

  • Packages that use JdbcDatabaseManager 
    Package Description
    org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.db.jdbc
    The JDBC Appender supports writing log events to a relational database using standard JDBC connections.

      Creates a JDBC manager for use within the JdbcAppender, or returns a suitable one if it already exists.
